org.jikesrvm.classloader

Class ClassFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jikesrvm.classloader.ClassFileReader

  • public class ClassFileReader
extends Object
    Support code to parse a DataInputStream in the Java classfile format and create the appropriate instance of an RVMClass or UnboxedType. Also low-level support for our internal constant pool format.

    • Method Detail

      • readConstantPool

        static int[] readConstantPool(TypeReference typeRef,
                              DataInputStream input)
                       throws ClassFormatError,
                              IOException
        Parse and return the constant pool in a class file
        Parameters:
        typeRef - the canonical type reference for this type.
        input - the data stream from which to read the class's description.
        Returns:
        constant pool as int array
        Throws:
        IOException - if it occurs during reading of the input stream
        ClassFormatError

      • readTypeRef

        static int readTypeRef(TypeReference typeRef,
                       DataInputStream input,
                       int[] constantPool)
                throws IOException,
                       ClassFormatError
        Read the class' TypeReference
        Parameters:
        typeRef - the type reference that we're expecting to read
        input - input stream
        constantPool - constant pool
        Returns:
        the constantPool index of the typeRef of the class we are reading
        Throws:
        IOException - when a problems occurs while reading the input stream
        ClassFormatError - when the read type ref does not match up with the expected type ref

      • getClassInitializerMethod

        static RVMMethod getClassInitializerMethod(RVMMethod[] declaredMethods)
        Returns the class initializer method among the declared methods of the class
        Parameters:
        declaredMethods - the methods declared by the class
        Returns:
        the class initializer method <clinit> of the class or null if none was found

      • readClass

        static RVMClass readClass(TypeReference typeRef,
                          DataInputStream input)
                   throws ClassFormatError,
                          IOException
        Creates an instance of a RVMClass.
        Parameters:
        typeRef - the canonical type reference for this type.
        input - the data stream from which to read the class's description.
        Returns:
        a newly created class
        Throws:
        IOException - when data cannot be read from the input stream or skipping during class construction reads less data than expected
        ClassFormatError - when the class data is corrupt

      • getLiteralOffset

        static Offset getLiteralOffset(int[] constantPool,
                               int constantPoolIndex)
        Get offset of a literal constant, in bytes. Offset is with respect to virtual machine's "table of contents" (jtoc).
        Parameters:
        constantPool - the constant pool
        constantPoolIndex - the index into the constant pool
        Returns:
        the offset in bytes from the JTOC
